name: 10101: Will the Starship
overview: 10101 Will the Starship is a starship shooter adventure game released in 1997.In the game the player will control the captain of a starship and all his crew in their journeys through the space. During the game the player have to control the starship (that can be a little hard moving it clicking with the pad) and there are a lot of encounter with enemy ships and pirates that puts the player in the place of selecting the proper order or even fire the weapons (that are show in the screen using a gunsight that is moving using the dpad).
